name: Regulated Professions Register

beta.label: Beta
beta.html: This is a new service - your feedback will help us to improve it.

service.name: Check a regulated profession in the UK

index.heading: Work in a regulated profession in the UK
intro: Some professions, jobs and trades in the UK are ‘regulated’. This means you must have certain qualifications or experience to work in them.
If you want to work in a regulated profession in the UK, you need to contact the regulatory authority for it.

The regulatory authority sets the requirements for qualifying for your profession, so it will check your experience and qualifications. If they’re recognised, the regulatory authority will register you.

checkProfessions.text: check if your profession is regulated and the qualifications and experience needed

findContactDetails.text: find contact details for your profession’s regulatory authority

help.heading: Get help checking a regulated profession
help.body: Contact the UK Centre for Professional Qualifications (UK CPQ) If you need support checking a regulated profession.

selectService.heading: Select what you want to do

options.checkRequirements: Check requirements for a regulated profession

beis: Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy
